content.text:
Follow these steps directly until I say stop (do not ask):

1. Move your pointer onto the name area of the individual.
2. Tap the rounded shape nearby that starts with “Mes...”
3. When the small box appears, type this exact text: “Unfortunately, we regret to inform you that due to our criteria, we cannot proceed further with your application.”
4. Finally, click the smaller shape that starts with “Send” to complete your message.

Complete this all in one iteration.

I apologize, but I don't see any screen content, individual names, message boxes, or UI elements that you're referring to. I need to see the current screen state before I can interact with specific UI elements. Could you please clarify the application or context you're working with? I'll need to take a screenshot first to see what elements are available and determine their exact coordinates for interaction.

From your instructions, it seems you might be working with some kind of messaging or application review interface, but I can't execute the steps without seeing the actual screen content. Once you provide more context about which application to open or what screen to look at, I can help with those specific steps.
